title: Making Kitchen Cabinets
brief_description: An instructional video aimed at people wishing to build kitchen cabinets, in a time saving manner that anticipates mistakes and allows for corrections. Access to a small workshop, equipped with a tablesaw, a router and some common hand-tools, is required as cabinet-maker Paul Levine introduces the simple step-by-step procedures that result in a professional finish.
